PetRecords

One Set Of Records
for all your pet's needs

Track all of your pets veterinary and other records. When you move all of your pet's records move with you. Better records means better care.

  • Transfer Records

    Keep records safe. Transfer all of a pet's records with the pet. Consistency when relocating between vets.

  • Secure

    Uses the same security, blockchain, that is used to protect the worlds banking system.

  • Permanent and Accessible

    Easy accessible from anywhere. No more forgotten shots / lost paperwork Available Anywhere any time.

  • Better Care

    Prevent duplicate procedures. Demonstrate authenticity of shots. Save valuable time at VET ER visits. No more searching for Pet records.

  • Share between care givers

    Move critical data from vet to vet. Allows records to be accessed by Dog sitters when away. Creates peace of mind.

  • Accurate history

    Know when a pet got a shot or treatment. Stores and keeps accurate medical records.
